name: Sumo Rampage
description:
Sumo Rampage! Eat, Drink and Repeat

Take control of a Drunk Sumo as he roam freely on streets. Watch out for the crazy traffic on the road and dash your way though them.

Collect Sake and Beer to recover yourself and avoid those healthy greens!

-------------------------------

This game was developed for GMTK 2020 game jam

-------------------------------

Art by: Anirudh Bansal 

Code by: Aman Hayer, Aman Yadav
Additional Code by:  Sidharth Bansal

Design: Sidharth Bansal

----------------------------

Hope you will enjoy it and let us know your thoughts in the comments below.
